message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a price that I think is fair, considering its value to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer elsewhere.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1000000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, but I have to consider my own needs as well. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1150000. This is a fair price that balances both of our interests.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1050000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I'll offer the product to you for $1075000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1020000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
